meanings.definition: A type of fish known for its ability to inflate itself when threatened.
meanings.sent1: The blowfishes in the aquarium looked cute as they puffed up.
meanings.sent2: I saw blowfishes swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The blowfishes decided to have a race to see who could puff up the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks resembled blowfishes as she tried to hold back her laughter.
meanings.sent5: The blowfishes in the story were magical creatures that could grant wishes.

meanings.definition: To swell or puff up like a blowfish in response to danger.
meanings.sent1: When he heard the loud noise, he blowfishes his cheeks in surprise.
meanings.sent2: The balloon blowfishes as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent3: She blowfishes her hair to make it look fuller and bouncier.
meanings.sent4: The situation made him blowfishes with anxiety, feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent5: The flower petals blowfishes in the wind, creating a beautiful dance.
